questionTitle: Mr. Walker's new ________ fitted so badly across the shoulders that he took it back to the shop to complain.
I'll go on holiday ________ I can.
Would you like ________ that for you?
They ________ our new transistor radio before.
She said she ________ to me, but she didn't.
If it ________ so late we could have coffee.
Frankly, I'd rather you ________ anything about it for the time being.
I wish that the weather ________ not so warm.
I walked away as calmly as I could ________ they thought I was the thief.
Although he has ________, his poor writing often clouds his thoughts.
She's gone already? And I am only ________ minutes late!
When he was questioned by the police, the thief didn't ________ the truth.
To get money for some purpose is to ________.
I ran quickly ________ late.
I bought ________ yesterday.
What does he do for a living?  He is ________ .
________ there in time, we must start now.
They have made a lot of progress ________ the country became independent.
The Boeing 747 is twice ________ the Boeing 707.
They are hanging up their clothes to make them ________.
